quest.name: Pitch Perfect
journal:
Managingway wants to spread the joy of music.

â€»Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
objectives: Ride the moon-hopper to the Carrotorium and perform the hop-step at the designated locations.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ever since we built the musicking station, many Ways have developed a liking for music.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: Many more, however, remain unaware of the station's pleasures, and I would like you to help spread the word.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: If you're willing, please report to Ridingway yonder. He has charge of the advertising effort, and will provide you with instructions.

dialogue.name: RIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ah, if it isn't Forename. Here to help us advertise the musicking station, yes?

dialogue.name: RIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: There isn't anything to it, really. You just need to play a spot of music for some Ways out there.

dialogue.name: RIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Without further ado, ride this moon-hopper over to the Carrotorium. Once there, use its hop-step function near a crowd. The feel-good sound it produces is bound to put a spring in our fellows' steps!

dialogue.name: RIDINGWAY
dialogue.text: Ride the moon-hopper over to the Carrotorium, and use its hop-step function near a crowd. The feel-good sound it produces is bound to put a spring in our fellows' steps!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Some Loporrits have gathered here. Speak with Ridingway in Hoper's Hold to mount the moon-hopper, then perform the hop-step in their midst.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4694
dialogue.text: (-Playful Loporrit-)Ooh, what agreeable, uplifting music! I can't help but want to rollick!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4694
dialogue.text: (-Playful Loporrit-)We can enjoy such feel-good sounds any time at this musicking station, you say? Thank you, we'll head there at once!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4694
dialogue.text: (-Playful Loporrit-)Oho, if it isn't the feel-good sounds of the musicking station! Such a wonderful place that was!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4694
dialogue.text: (-Playful Loporrit-)It's been too long since my last visit. I'll quickly finish up my work, then head over there again and hop till I drop!

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4694
dialogue.text: (-Languid Loporrit-)M-My tail and ears, they move as if they possessed a mind of their own... What in creation was that joyful sound?

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4694
dialogue.text: (-Languid Loporrit-)The musicking station... I never knew such a marvelous place existed. I'll pay a visit as soon as I can.

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4694
dialogue.text: (-Languid Loporrit-)Oh, there it is again, the sound that makes my tail and ears want to dance...

dialogue.name: LOPORRIT4694
dialogue.text: (-Languid Loporrit-)I must say, I was quite impressed with the musicking station, with its animated atmosphere. I must pay another visit after work.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: There you are, Forename. My colleagues at the musicking station are pleased to report a measurable increase in guests.

dialogue.name: MANAGINGWAY
dialogue.text: This is no doubt due to your efforts. We hope to advertise the facility on a regular basis, and when next we do so, I trust we can depend on you again.
